response.original_title: La force du destin: L'aventure de Jean de Florette et De manon des sources
response.overview: This documentary on the making of JEAN DE FLORETTE and MANON OF THE SPRING features director Claude Berri; actors Yves Montand and Gérard Depardieu; assistant director Xavier Castano; editors Hervé de Luze and Arlette Langmann; executive producer Pierre Grunstein; and composer Jean-Claude Petit.
response.title: La force du destin: L'aventure de Jean de Florette et De manon des sources
